parameters.name: additive
parameters.description: Type of module component to add to the feeding

parameters.name: datetime
parameters.description: Return nutrition orders requested on this date

parameters.name: encounter
parameters.description: Return nutrition orders with this encounter identifier

parameters.name: formula
parameters.description: Type of enteral or infant formula

parameters.name: identifier
parameters.description: Return nutrition orders with this external identifier

parameters.name: oraldiet
parameters.description: Type of diet that can be consumed orally (i.e., take via the mouth).

parameters.name: patient
parameters.description: The identity of the person who requires the diet, formula or nutritional supplement

parameters.name: provider
parameters.description: The identity of the provider who placed the nutrition order

info.description: Diet, formula or nutritional supplement request
info.title: FHIR R4 NutritionOrder Resource

NutritionOrder.description: Diet, formula or nutritional supplement request

allergyIntolerance.description: A link to a record of allergies or intolerances  which should be included in the nutrition order.

dateTime.description: The date and time that this nutrition order was requested.

encounter.description: The encounter associated with this nutrition order

excludeFoodModifier.description: Order-specific modifier about the type of food that should not be given

foodPreferenceModifier.description: Order-specific modifier about the type of food that should be given

identifier.description: Identifiers assigned to this order by the order sender or by the order receiver.

implicitRules.description: A set of rules under which this content was created

intent.description: proposal | plan | directive | order | original-order | reflex-order | filler-order | instance-order | option

language.description: The base language in which the resource is written.

note.description: Comments made about the {{title}} by the requester, performer, subject or other participants.

orderer.description: Who ordered the diet, formula or nutritional supplement

patient.description: The person who requires the diet, formula or nutritional supplement

status.description: The workflow status of the nutrition order/request.

text.description: Text summary of the resource, for human interpretation

additiveProductName.description: Product or brand name of the modular additive

additiveType.description: Type of modular component to add to the feeding

administration.description: Formula feeding instruction as structured data

administrationInstruction.description: Formula feeding instructions expressed as text

baseFormulaProductName.description: Product or brand name of the enteral or infant formula

baseFormulaType.description: Type of enteral or infant formula

caloricDensity.description: Amount of energy per specified volume that is required

maxVolumeToDeliver.description: Upper limit on formula volume per unit of time

routeofAdministration.description: How the formula should enter the patient's gastrointestinal tract

quantity.description: The volume of formula to provide

rate[x].description: Speed with which the formula is provided per period of time

fluidConsistencyType.description: The required consistency of fluids and liquids provided to the patient

instruction.description: Instructions or additional information about the oral diet

type.description: Type of oral diet or diet restrictions that describe what can be consumed orally

modifier.description: Type of nutrient that is being modified

foodType.description: Concepts that are used to identify an entity that is ingested for nutritional purposes

modifier.description: Code to indicate how to alter the texture of the foods, e.g. pureed

instruction.description: Instructions or additional information about the oral supplement

productName.description: Product or brand name of the nutritional supplement

display.description: Plain text narrative that identifies the resource in addition to the resource reference.

identifier.description: Logical reference, when literal reference is not known

reference.description: Literal reference, Relative, internal or absolute URL

implicitRules.description: A set of rules under which this content was created

language.description: The base language in which the resource is written.

coding.description: A reference to a code defined by a terminology system.

text.description: Plain text representation of the concept

url.description: Source of the definition for the extension code - a logical name or a URL.

period.description: Time period during which identifier is/was valid for use.

system.description: The namespace for the identifier value

lastUpdated.description: When the resource last changed - e.g. when the version changed.

profile.description: Profiles this resource claims to conform to

security.description: Security Labels applied to this resource

source.description: Identifies where the resource comes from

author[x].description: The individual responsible for making the annotation.

text.description: The text of the annotation in markdown format.

time.description: Indicates when this particular annotation was made.

div.description: The actual narrative content, a stripped down version of XHTML.

code.description: Symbol in syntax defined by the system

display.description: A representation of the meaning of the code in the system, following the rules of the system.

system.description: The identification of the code system that defines the meaning of the symbol in the code.

userSelected.description: If this coding was chosen directly by the user

version.description: Version of the system - if relevant

end.description: End time with inclusive boundary, if not ongoing

start.description: The start of the period. The boundary is inclusive.

code.description: A computer processable form of the unit in some unit representation system.

system.description: The identification of the system that provides the coded form of the unit.

unit.description: A human-readable form of the unit.

code.description: BID | TID | QID | AM | PM | QD | QOD | +

event.description: Identifies specific times when the event occurs.
